
---
title: '小米官方拆解 3 台 Redmi K40 游戏版，重组 600 个零件，打造王一博未来机甲战士'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/dade8f87-6240-4732-b525-efb4a38e4062.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Thu, 05 Aug 2021 00:52:22 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/dade8f87-6240-4732-b525-efb4a38e4062.png'
---

<div>   
<p><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 8 月 5 日消息 今天 Redmi 红米手机官方发微博视频，表示，拆解了 3 部 K40 游戏版，重组 600 个零件，耗时 90 天，精心打造出未来机甲战士，并且展示了王一博未来机甲战士的效果。</p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/dade8f87-6240-4732-b525-efb4a38e4062.png" w="595" h="334" title="小米官方拆解 3 台 Redmi K40 游戏版，重组 600 个零件，打造王一博未来机甲战士" width="595" height="334" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/a13a46e6-3cf9-43a9-91ec-0ee598d322de.png" w="598" h="333" title="小米官方拆解 3 台 Redmi K40 游戏版，重组 600 个零件，打造王一博未来机甲战士" width="598" height="333" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/3ee2ddd8-0728-4d1a-9488-0c0a7efe4cdc.png" w="711" h="675" title="小米官方拆解 3 台 Redmi K40 游戏版，重组 600 个零件，打造王一博未来机甲战士" width="711" height="675" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p>下面是视频：</p><p><a class="ithome_super_player" contenteditable="false" target="_blank" data-timestamp="1628124631925" data-vpreview-url="https://f.video.weibocdn.com/e7R4lYCIlx07OMnKzFFe01041200XVUr0E010.mp4?label=mp4_720p&template=1280x720.25.0&trans_finger=1f0da16358befad33323e3a1b7f95fc9&ori=0&ps=1CwnkDw1GXwCQx&Expires=1628128219&ssig=LE504GTl8N&KID=unistore,video" href="https://weibo.com/3021514657/Ks0jT5Szs?from=page_1006063021514657_profile&wvr=6&mod=weibotime&type=comment"></a></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; max-width: calc(100% - 10px); white-space: normal;">IT之家获悉，Redmi K40 游戏版“逆鳞特别款”已正式开售，该机配置保持不变，但外观更为硬核，采用了独特工艺，背部特殊纹理自然天成，售价 2699 元（12GB+256GB）。</p><p style="max-width: calc(100% - 10px); white-space: normal;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/7/e0f3ce84-147d-411d-9514-f9fde641f3a5.jpg" w="690" h="920" title="小米官方拆解 3 台 Redmi K40 游戏版，重组 600 个零件，打造王一博未来机甲战士" width="690" height="920" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="max-width: calc(100% - 10px); white-space: normal;"><span class="accentTextColor">Redmi K40 游戏版“逆鳞特别款”背面拥有精美绝伦“逆鳞”纹路，仿佛未来机甲</span>。</p><p style="max-width: calc(100% - 10px); white-space: normal;">配置方面，Redmi K40 游戏版“逆鳞特别款”跟普通版一样，搭载联发科天玑 1200 芯片，采用一块 6.67 寸 OLED 柔性直屏，分辨率为 2400x1080，后摄模组由 6400 万像素主摄 + 800 万像素超广角 + 200 万像素微距组成，同时手机还拥有弹出式肩键设计。该机厚度为 8.3mm，重量为 205g，内置 5065mAh 电池，支持 67W 闪充。</p><p style="max-width: calc(100% - 10px); white-space: normal;">IT之家了解到，此前 Redmi K40 游戏增强版已经上市了暗影、银翼和光刃、李小龙特别款等配色。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAO0JK1olXQ4LXFxZCkwWBl8IGloUXQULUlpbCksnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWA2wBHV8TXwYdDRsBVXtlHWwMfV5OKmMKTiwjTSBDQCxYeAd1UQoyUV5cCUkXBGsKHWsWXwEAUlpYC0wnYAhmRABLOEdeFS5tCkoUAm4KKxl7iYe8gt7f3_Ot1MKDw--piIyFZF5eD08VBmcIG18lXQEBXV5eDUwVBW8LGGsVVQEyCBwPSQknM18LK2slXTYBZAAzCRgXUzxfTg97B0VKUgsJCgJ5AWkPGF0QXgUyVl9cCkk" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="100012875731"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/191723/23/15215/98771/60ff7b66E19752ae6/4494361b17a459d1.jpg" title="小米官方拆解 3 台 Redmi K40 游戏版，重组 600 个零件，打造王一博未来机甲战士" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> Redmi K40 游戏增强版 12GB+256GB 逆鳞 </span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">2699 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
